original_text: The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.
korean_text: 악인의 길은 어둠 같아서 그가 걸려 넘어져도 그것이 무엇인지 깨닫지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: The way of the wicked is as darkness
they know not at what they stumble
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 무엇에 걸려 넘어지는지 알지 못하느니라
